mdRecord.dcterms:title: Black and White Photograph Mounted on a Wooden Postcard, July 1956
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph mounted on wooden postcard of a pair of men, one in a vehicle and the other walking or running beside him, and the writing on the postcard reads "Hello, Having nice time just back from fishing(?) - no luck see you next week, Maurice", dated for July 1956
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
